sentences.sContent: ...a horrifying videotape of a man swinging from a noose.
sentences.sCn: …一盘一名男子吊在绞索上的恐怖录像带。

trans.tranCn: 套索, 束缚, 陷阱, (the noose)绞刑
trans.tranOther: A noose is a circular loop at the end of a piece of rope or wire. A noose is tied with a knot that allows it to be tightened, and it is usually used to trap animals or hang people.
